languages.text: Отправленные на шаттле разведчики видят признаки пребывания разумных существ. Судя по вытоптанной почве и остовам шатров, кто-то разбивал здесь лагерь. Отдаленные силуэты образовывают сплетение троп и преград — лабиринт. Внешние стены дополнены многочисленными шипами и клинками, а также украшены лоскутами кожи и иссохшими распятыми пленниками. Не нужно быть экспертом по ксенокультуре, чтобы понять, что здесь побывали друкари.

The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

Отдаленные силуэты образовывают сплетение троп и преград — лабиринт. Внешние стены дополнены многочисленными шипами и клинками, а также украшены лоскутами кожи и иссохшими распятыми пленниками. Не нужно быть экспертом по ксенокультуре, чтобы понять, что здесь побывали друкари.

traits.locale_text: Scouts sent by shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

languages.text: 穿梭机上的侦察兵看到了智慧生命的迹象。从被踩踏的泥土与帐篷的架子来看，有人曾在这里扎过营。远处的轮廓看起来像座迷宫一样，到处充斥着复杂的路径与障碍物。外墙上安装着许多残损的尖刺与破片，上面装饰着皮革的碎片，还有几名囚犯的干尸被钉在了墙上。哪怕不是异形文化方面的专家，也能轻易推断出黑暗灵族曾造访过这个地方。
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

traits.locale_text: 穿梭机上的侦察兵看到了智慧生命的迹象。从被踩踏的泥土与帐篷的架子来看，有人曾在这里扎过营。远处的轮廓看起来像座迷宫一样，到处充斥着复杂的路径与障碍物。外墙上安装着许多残损的尖刺与破片，上面装饰着皮革的碎片，还有几名囚犯的干尸被钉在了墙上。哪怕不是异形文化方面的专家，也能轻易推断出黑暗灵族曾造访过这个地方。

languages.text: シャトルの偵察隊は、知的生命体の痕跡を発見した。踏み固められた土とテントのフレームから判断すると、誰かがここでキャンプを張ったようだ。遠くのシルエットが、道と障害物が入り組んだ迷路のようになっている。外壁はたくさんのトゲや刃物で補われ、革の切れ端や枯れた磔にされた囚人で飾られている。デュカーリがここにいたことは、異国文化の専門家でなくても推論できる。
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

traits.locale_text: シャトルの偵察隊は、知的生命体の痕跡を発見した。踏み固められた土とテントのフレームから判断すると、誰かがここでキャンプを張ったようだ。遠くのシルエットが、道と障害物が入り組んだ迷路のようになっている。外壁はたくさんのトゲや刃物で補われ、革の切れ端や枯れた磔にされた囚人で飾られている。デュカーリがここにいたことは、異国文化の専門家でなくても推論できる。

languages.text: Los exploradores de la lanzadera ven señales de vida inteligente. A juzgar por el suelo pisoteado y las estructuras de las tiendas, alguien acampó aquí. Unas siluetas lejanas forman una maraña de caminos y obstáculos: un laberinto. Las paredes exteriores están reforzadas con multitud de pinchos y cuchillas y decoradas con trozos de cuero y prisioneros crucificados y marchitos. No hace falta ser un experto en cultura xenos para saber que los Drukhari han estado aquí.
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores de la lanzadera ven señales de vida inteligente. A juzgar por el suelo pisoteado y las estructuras de las tiendas, alguien acampó aquí. Unas siluetas lejanas forman una maraña de caminos y obstáculos: un laberinto. Las paredes exteriores están reforzadas con multitud de pinchos y cuchillas y decoradas con trozos de cuero y prisioneros crucificados y marchitos. No hace falta ser un experto en cultura xenos para saber que los Drukhari han estado aquí.

languages.text: Die Späher aus dem Shuttle sehen Anzeichen von intelligentem Leben. Der zertrampelten Erde und den Zeltrahmen nach zu urteilen, hatte hier jemand sein Lager aufgeschlagen. Ferne Silhouetten bilden ein Gewirr aus Pfaden und Hindernissen, ein Labyrinth. An den Außenwänden befinden sich unzählige Stacheln und Klingen, zudem sind sie mit Lederfetzen und den verdorrten Leichen gekreuzigter Gefangener verziert. Man muss kein Fachmann für Xenokultur sein, um darauf zu kommen, dass hier Drukhari am Werk waren.
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

traits.locale_text: Die Späher aus dem Shuttle sehen Anzeichen von intelligentem Leben. Der zertrampelten Erde und den Zeltrahmen nach zu urteilen, hatte hier jemand sein Lager aufgeschlagen. Ferne Silhouetten bilden ein Gewirr aus Pfaden und Hindernissen, ein Labyrinth. An den Außenwänden befinden sich unzählige Stacheln und Klingen, zudem sind sie mit Lederfetzen und den verdorrten Leichen gekreuzigter Gefangener verziert. Man muss kein Fachmann für Xenokultur sein, um darauf zu kommen, dass hier Drukhari am Werk waren.

languages.text: Les éclaireurs débarqués de la navette repèrent aussitôt des signes de vie intelligente. À en juger par le sol piétiné et les armatures de tente, quelqu'un a dressé son camp ici même. Un peu plus loin, des silhouettes forment un entrelacs de sentiers et d'obstacles, telle une sorte de labyrinthe. Hérissées d'une multitude de piques et autres lames, les parois extérieures sont ornées de lambeaux de cuir et des cadavres desséchés de prisonniers crucifiés. Inutile d'être un expert en xénoculture pour comprendre que des Drukharis sont passés par là.
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.

Hérissées d'une multitude de piques et autres lames, les parois extérieures sont ornées de lambeaux de cuir et des cadavres desséchés de prisonniers crucifiés. languages.text: Mekikteki keşif erleri, zeki yaşam formlarından işaretler görüyor. Çiğnenmiş toprakla çadır iskeletlerine bakılacak olursa birileri burada kamp kurmuş. Uzak silüetler; patikalarla engellerden oluşan bir düğüm hâline gelmiş: Bu bir labirent. Dış duvarlara çok sayıda kazık ve bıçak saplanmış, ayrıca deri parçaları ve çarmıha gerilip çürümüş mahkûmlarla süslenmiş. Buradan Drukharilerin geçtiği çıkarımına varmak için zeno kültürü eksperi olmaya gerek yok.
languages.original_text: The scouts from the shuttle see signs of intelligent life. Judging by the trampled soil and tent frames, someone made camp here. Distant silhouettes form a tangle of paths and obstacles — a maze. The outer walls are supplemented by a multitude of spikes and blades and decorated with scraps of leather and withered crucified prisoners. It does not take an expert in xenoculture to reason that Drukhari have been here.
